name: postgraphile_user_system
description: Sqitch-based user system for postgraphile project.  After postgraphile starter project

scripts.test: PGUSER=${PGUSER:=postgres} PGHOST=${PGHOST:=127.0.0.1} PGPORT=${PGPORT:=5432} PGDATABASE=${PGDATABASE:=sqitch} pg_prove test/*.sql
scripts.sqitch:deploy: PGUSER=${PGUSER:=postgres} PGHOST=${PGHOST:=127.0.0.1} PGPORT=${PGPORT:=5432} PGDATABASE=${PGDATABASE:=sqitch} sqitch deploy
scripts.sqitch:revert: PGUSER=${PGUSER:=postgres} PGHOST=${PGHOST:=127.0.0.1} PGPORT=${PGPORT:=5432} PGDATABASE=${PGDATABASE:=sqitch} sqitch revert -y

author: James E. Marca
